title: UPVOTE IF YOU ARE...
body: a proud independent forum goer who don't need to be told when to upvote things.

replies.body:
Oh!
I **AM** a proud, independent forum-goer, who doesn't need to be told when to upvote things.

Unfortunately for you, your grammar is worse than a Wood V Yasuo, in the allied ranks.
I will leave it at no vote for now, but I shall not be so forgiving next time.
Weird but you kinda got what you wanted...
